original_title: The Best of Babes in Toyland and Kat Bjelland
overview: This UK-only import DVD features 17 videos -- including their music video clips, shorts and live material:  Spanking Machine (Making of)  Painkillers (Making of)  Nemesisters (Making of)  He's My Thing (Music Video)  Ripe (Music Video)  Bruise Violet (Music Video)  Won't Tell (Music Video)  Sweet '69 (Music Video)  Liberty Belle (Live)  Bonus Material (Early footage of Kat Bjelland, live performances, and Crunt music videos)
title: The Best of Babes in Toyland and Kat Bjelland
